paragraphs.content: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

paragraphs.content: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

paragraphs.content: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.

paragraphs.content: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

paragraphs.content: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;

paragraphs.content: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.

paragraphs.content: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.

paragraphs.content: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

paragraphs.content: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

paragraphs.content: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

paragraphs.content: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

paragraphs.content: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.

paragraphs.content: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

paragraphs.content: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

paragraphs.content: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
